documents.document: @Pigsback_IE so sorry to hear that v. sad news. Nick was such a gentleman. Condolences from all at @MarieKeating to his family& colleagues
@PaulOMahony @ireland_tweet @blindrunner777 @GreatOutdoors76 @WorldMarathon77 amazing & awesome!!! Go Sinead!
@climurphy @juneshannon @MarieKeating think it's a combination of factors & FAKE 'facts' & scaremongering #irishmed
@juneshannon @drlfarrell well done for organising this forum during #CervicalCancer week #irishmed #sharethewisdom @MarieKeating
@juneshannon but we also need to educate the girls - & boys - with the facts. @MarieKeating schools cancer program does this #irishmed
@pjcoogan @HSELive #irishmed - agree. As parents, teachers & health professionals we need to challenge the scaremongers @MarieKeating
@AngeCMJ @MarieKeating schools programme is giving SPHE teachers & students the facts about all cancers & #hpv #irishmed
@missbrownetoyou but we need to do a better job educating parents & teachers about importance of vaccine #irishmed
I'm just inviting my teenage daughter & friends to join this discussion & challenge the FAKE 'facts' leading to lower uptake #hpv #irishmed
@drnickgp @UCDMedicine @drlfarrell that's why it's so important for all health professionals to get behind vaccine & vaccination #irishmed
